section.title: "View an answer from an expert"
section.p: When you use Ask an expert to get help, you can view the answer after the expert responds.
Click the link in the email you receive automatically when the expert answers your question, or if you're not set up with an email in ThoughtSpot:

li.p: Click Answers in the top menu.
Click the name of the answer you want to review. If you can't find it, try using the Yours filter to narrow down the list.

section.p: The answer will include any changes the expert made, to get to the answer you were looking for. You should review the new answer, to learn from the things the expert did to answer your question.
Note that the answer is a full fledged ThoughtSpot answer. This means that you can pin it to a pinboard, edit it, or share it with others, just like the result of any ThoughtSpot search.
